channel.title: Rain Magic on SWAGGERWORDS
channel.description: Recent content in Rain Magic on SWAGGERWORDS

item.title: Rain Magic By Erle Stanley Gardner
item.description: Rain Magic By Erle Stanley Gardner Novelette–Complete FACT OR FICTION RAIN MAGIC is a most unusual story; it is one of those tales that leave something in the reader’s mind to think about-something on which his opin- ion is as good as any one else’s–as good as that of the author himself. From the middle of the California desert it came to us–a story of the far places of tropical Africa.
